title: Lol tanking too much CPU
body:
I have a 1,80ghz of CPU on my computer.When i playing Lol i dont run any programs but just the game taking me 40-50% of cpu(Laggggg)pls help me.Should i buy a new CPU?
(sr for my English,i dont really good)

replies.body:
Your PC could certainly be going through some stress, but there are a few steps to help.  First and foremost, double check your air vents to make sure that your PC has some solid air flow to keep cool.  You could also try enabling [Close client during game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png), which will close the client while in a match to help with pc stress.  

If you continue to have any issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can take a closer look with you!
